As an AI language model, I do not have access to Milner's thoughts or actions. However, Milner has a reputation for his commitment to social and environmental causes, and it is possible that this is reflected in his business practices.

For example, Milner founded the Breakthrough Prize, which recognizes scientists working towards breakthroughs in fundamental physics, life sciences, and mathematics. This initiative reflects Milner's commitment to advancing scientific research and innovation, and it may also influence the priorities of his business ventures.

Additionally, he has invested in technology companies that aim to address social and environmental problems, such as those focused on alternative energy and sustainable agriculture. By backing these companies, Milner is not only supporting their business goals but also contributing to broader social and environmental objectives.

Overall, while it is unclear how much Milner's activism directly influences his business practices, it seems likely that his values and beliefs play some role in shaping the priorities of his businesses and investments.
